title: october 22: copy that, chester
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia tells the tale of the man who invented a little tool we use to make duplicates….the copy machine. For our music fact, she revisits the birth of the epic album ‘good kid m.A.A.D. City.’ Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
